extendedInfo.description: This book of horoscopes for the year 2011 have been specially formatted for today's e-readers.  See what the future holds for you!  The predictions mainly deal with the three most important areas in people's lives â work, family life and romance although another subject may appear occasionally. Advice appears in some forecasts together with a little gentle criticism of people who take themselves too seriously. It is hoped that the predictions will bring smiles, encouragement and pleasure to the readers. Good luck in 2011!
